original_text: You would play a game to win a child who has no family. You would even sell your friends to become rich yourselves. You would play a game to win a child who has no family. korean_text: 너희는 고아를 제비 뽑으며 너희 친구를 팔아 넘기는구나

sentences.original_text: You would even sell your friends
